title: How to make a song that hits 1 million views on YouTube - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t try nor do I know how one of my videos got to one million views.  Honestly, I just thought it’d be really hilarious. like bringing a whoopie cushion to class. So I record myself singing the song using my camera…took about 8 times before I could do it without cracking up…then, I made some photos on photoshop and used moviemaker to put it all together…perhaps the fact that I lucked out at getting a random good thumbnail that youtube automatically chooses for you (there’s 3 thumbnails that you can choose from when you upload a video for free that youtube gives you) Otherwise, I have no clue why else. it’s funny. hehe
